item.title: Nostalgia
item.description: We wander down through the lost pathways of the lake And see in shimmering quality all that lies below, The candlescent trout of yesteryear All swimming through a warm, enchanted glow; High on a brough the soft, unflinching moon Casts gaudy shadows round about The greying hairs upon thy mortal head And sees no sound more anxious than the quails; There we met in happy, joyful times A thousand finches trailing to a stream,
